name: Guiding Light (itch) (jayemms98)
description:
Overcome with grief, Kiki knows only one place where her heart will feel at peace. Atop the hill where they had first met.

A story of processing grief, of losing a loved one, exactly how far can love motivate us, even past the point of one’s life? Feelings of a bittersweet goodbye, a guiding light pushes her to finally move on.

-----------
